alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 25 at 2:56AM EDT until March 25 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM EDT FOR WALKER AND SOUTHWESTERN DADE COUNTIES... At 256 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lakeview, or 7 miles south of Chattanooga, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, La Fayette, Chattanooga Valley, Center Post, Rising Fawn, Noble, Fairview, Linwood, Chattanooga Valley, Cloudland Canyon State Park and Cooper Heights. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
